Package fr.cnrs.iees.uit.space

Interface Sphere

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dimensioned
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SphereImpl
    public interface Sphere
extends Dimensioned

    A generalised sphere in n-dimensional space (also called n-sphere. Basically, it represents a set of points within a constant distance of a central point. Immutable.

    • Method Summary

      static Sphere outSphere​(Box b)

      default boolean overlaps​(Box b)  
      default boolean overlaps​(Sphere s)  
      double radius()  
      double size()
      returns the length / surface / volume / hypervolume (according to dimension) of this sphere
      static Sphere valueOf​(java.lang.String s)
      reads a Sphere value from a String - assumes the Sphere has been saved with the toString() method of a Sphere implementation

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the two Spheres overlap

        Parameters:

        Returns:
